name: Spike Ninja For Mobile
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Spike Ninja~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You are the ninja who will soon become the master ninja
But the BLUE NINJA the bad guys do not want you to become the master ninja but you have hope but your master is very old and is weak so the BLUE NINJA know that if they kill him that all of Japan will lose hope but you need to over come this challenge so you can defeat the BLUE NINJA but it will not be easy please all of Japan is counting on you to save them from the BLUE NINJA please have hope to win it will be hard
